articles.description: In 12 seasons at Manchester United, veteran goalkeeper David de Gea won numerous accolades, but he leaves the club on a sad note.
articles.content: Erik ten Hag had doubts about David de Gea from his first day in charge of Manchester United, but towards the end of last season it reached the point of no return. Last summer, Ten Hag's first in cha… [+4779 chars]

articles.author: NDTV Sports Desk
articles.title: Harry Brook Makes History, Achieves Phenomenal Record During Ashes 2023 - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Harry Brook entered history books with a massive record during the third Ashes Test at Headingley.
articles.content: England cricket team batter Harry Brook made history on Sunday as he became the fastest to reach 1000 Test runs in terms of balls faced during the third Ashes encounter against Australia at Headingle… [+1270 chars]
